tool.name: script_manager
tool.description: generates heatsmaps, fourcolor plot and tagpileup
tool.command: #set output_dir = $output_out.files_path mkdir -p $output_dir && cp $input_bed 'tmp.bed' && cp $input_bam 'tmp2.bam' && samtools index tmp2.bam $output_dir/../working/tmp2.bam.bai && python $__tool_directory__/sleep.py && java -jar $__tool_directory__/ScriptManager_owlangFork-0.121-dev.jar read-analysis tag-pileup 'tmp.bed' 'tmp2.bam' -M pileup -o 'composite_data.out' && java -jar $__tool_directory__/ScriptManager_owlangFork-0.121-dev.jar figure-generation composite-plot 'composite_data.out' -o 'composite_24466_motif1.png' && mv $output_dir/../working/*.png '$output_out'
